ta.aseloader
Class ObjectFaceData

java.lang.Object
  ta.aseloader.ObjectFaceData
public class ObjectFaceData
extends java.lang.Object

Class that holds a single object with only one texture.

Constructor Detail

ObjectFaceData

public ObjectFaceData(int p_frames,
                      int p_faces,
                      java.lang.String p_texturefile)
Constructor allocates memeory for all frames' faces, and store the texture file name this model will be assigned.

Parameters:
p_frames - Amount of frames the object consists of
p_faces - How many faces the object will consist of
p_texturefile - Texture file name
Method Detail

setFaceVertex

public void setFaceVertex(int p_frame,
                          int p_faceindex,
                          int p_vertindex,
                          float p_x,
                          float p_y,
                          float p_z)
Stores a vertex data for a given face index

Parameters:
p_frame - Frame to store vertex data for
p_faceindex - What face to save to
p_vertindex - What vertex index of the frame to save to
p_x - Vertex x coordinate
p_y - Vertex y coordinate
p_z - Vertex z coordinate

setFaceVertexTexCoord

public void setFaceVertexTexCoord(int p_faceindex,
                                  int p_vertindex,
                                  float p_u,
                                  float p_v)
Stores texture coordinate data

Parameters:
p_faceindex - Face index
p_vertindex - Face vertex index
p_u - U coordinate
p_v - V coordinate

setFaceVertexColor

public void setFaceVertexColor(int p_faceindex,
                               int p_vertindex,
                               float p_r,
                               float p_g,
                               float p_b)
Store a face's color data

Parameters:
p_faceindex - Face index
p_vertindex - Face vertex index
p_r - Red color component, float 0-1
p_g - Green color component, float 0-1
p_b - Blue color component, float 0-1

setTextureFileName

public void setTextureFileName(java.lang.String p_filename)
Store texture name for this object

Parameters:
p_filename -

calcAllNormals

public void calcAllNormals(boolean p_curved)
Calculates all normals, for both faces and vertices.

Parameters:
p_curved - Set to true if the object should be shaded curve-like

calcAllNormalsFlat

public void calcAllNormalsFlat()
Calculates all normals, for both faces and vertices. This function makes the object appear flat-shaded.

calcFaceNormals

public void calcFaceNormals()
Calculates only the face normals. If vertex normals are not interesting, this function is for you.

getTextureFileName

public java.lang.String getTextureFileName()
Returns:
The texture file name attached to this object.

getFaceCount

public int getFaceCount()
Returns:
Number of faces this object consists of

getFaceData

public float[][][][] getFaceData()
Returns all faces' position data

Returns:
float[frame][face (0-faces)][vertex (0-2)][vertex coordinate (x=0, z=2) AND vertex normal (nx = 3, nz = 5)]

getFaceTexCoords

public float[][][] getFaceTexCoords()
Returns texture coordinates for the faces

Returns:
float[face (0-faces)][vertex (0-2)][texcoords (u=0, v=1)]

getFaceColors

public float[][][] getFaceColors()
Returns color components for the faces

Returns:
float[face (0-faces)][vertex (0-2)][colors (r=0, g=1, b=2)]

getFaceNormals

public float[][][] getFaceNormals()
Returns the face normal data

Returns:
float[face (0-faces)][vertex (0-2)][normal vector, 3f]

getFrameCount

public int getFrameCount()
Returns number of frames.

Returns:
Number of frames the object consists of
